titleInfo.title: Brushing up or aside? - Analyzing the modifying functions of gesture in different multimodal utterance contexts

bibliographicCitation.ama: Freigang F, Kopp S. Brushing up or aside? - Analyzing the modifying functions of gesture in different multimodal utterance contexts. Presented at the Workshop Mapping Multimodal Dialogue (MaMuD 3), Lille, France.
